trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> classes along with the semantics for forward-chaining execution of those rules.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> 类和这些规则的正向链接执行语义的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> can be executed directly in code or using the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.PolicyActivity" /> activity.
trans-unit.target: 可以直接用代码或使用 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 活动执行 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.PolicyActivity" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> class by using the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 的名称初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: A description of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 的说明。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> class by using the name and description of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 的名称和说明初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the forward chaining behavior for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> classes in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> 中 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 类的正向链接行为。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleChainingBehavior" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> classes in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleChainingBehavior" /> 中 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> 类的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建当前 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 的深层副本。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> that is identical to this instance.
trans-unit.target: 与此实例完全相同的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a description of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 的说明。

trans-unit.source: A description of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 的说明。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two object instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: 确定两个对象实例是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> that is invoking the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 与调用 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 相关联的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />。

trans-unit.source: Evaluates the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> instances in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 计算 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ruleExecution" /> is a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ruleExecution" /> 为 <see langword="null" /> 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: The cached <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" /> cannot be validated.
trans-unit.target: 无法验证缓存的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取和设置 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> classes in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> 中 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 类的列表。

trans-unit.source: A list of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> classes in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> 中 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 类的列表。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager" /> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: 要管理验证过程的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager" />。

trans-unit.source: Validates the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> attributes and the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> classes in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 验证 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 属性和 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 类。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection" /> of errors found during validation.
trans-unit.target: 在验证过程中发现的错误的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> contains errors (the `Validate` method returns `false`), then <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> contains the list of errors encountered.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> 包含错误（`Validate` 方法返回 `false`），则 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 将包含遇到的错误的列表。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="validation" /> is a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="validation" /> 为 <see langword="null" /> 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。
